channel.title: authentication on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in authentication on SoftLayer API

item.title: Password Auth
item.description: require 'softlayer_api' # Requires softlayer_api >= 3.2 # Create a client client = SoftLayer::Client.with_password( username: 'change me', password: 'change me') # Test our client puts client['Account'].object_mask('mask[id, apiAuthenticationKeys]'). getCurrentUser
